reviewText:
Great series. Captivating, emotional, erotic and funny.

Plus a handsome Bill Nighy naked.

A fine 5 part series about adults in London with their quirks, guilts and passions, and a love affair too intense to last. Great acting from a cast led by Bill Nighy and Harriet Walter. A pity it's only on PAL but worth your while getting a player capable of reading NTSC and PAL to see this enthralling, creative mini series.
